pages.summary:
A passionate security researcher, Developer, and a Writer. Hi !! I’m Mihin, a 23-year-old Computer Science undergraduate from Sri Lanka. I am passionate about security research and software development (specially system softwares on Linux/Windows), and also enjoy expressing my thoughts through writing. Currently,
I am working on my personal projects, which you can explore below.
[*] Simple IDS [*] Scraper for my own use [*] Simple game engine // These days i’m cooking with Rust and hope to learn GO.
